question:
You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
The letter T is formed by placing two $2\:\text{inch}\!\times\!4\:\text{inch}$ rectangles next to each other, as shown.  What is the perimeter of the T, in inches? [asy]
draw((1,0)--(3,0)--(3,4)--(4,4)--(4,6)--(0,6)--(0,4)--(1,4)--cycle);
[/asy]
inference:
The T shape is formed by two rectangles.
Each rectangle has dimensions $2$ inches by $4$ inches.
The two rectangles are placed side by side.
The length of the horizontal part of the T is $2+2 = 4$ inches.
The vertical part of the T is $4 + 4 - 2 = 6$ inches.
The horizontal part of the perimeter is $4 + 2 + 2 = 8$ inches.
The vertical part of the perimeter is $4+ 4 + 4 = 12$ inches.
Perimeter = $4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 2 + 2 = 16$ inches
Perimeter = $8+6 \times 2 = 8+12=20$ inches
Perimeter = $2(2+4) + 2(2+2) = 2(6) + 2(4) = 12 + 8 = 20$ inches.
Perimeter = $2\times 2 + 2\times 4 + 2\times 2 + 2\times 4 -2 \times 2 = 4 + 8 + 4 + 8 - 4 = 20$ inches
Final Answer: $\boxed{20}$

question:
The T shape is formed by two rectangles.
Each rectangle has dimensions $2$ inches by $4$ inches.
The two rectangles are placed side by side.
The length of the horizontal part of the T is $2+2 = 4$ inches.
The vertical part of the T is $4 + 4 - 2 = 6$ inches.
The horizontal part of the perimeter is $4 + 2 + 2 = 8$ inches.
The vertical part of the perimeter is $4+ 4 + 4 = 12$ inches.
Perimeter = $4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 2 + 2 = 16$ inches
Perimeter = $8+6 \times 2 = 8+12=20$ inches
Perimeter = $2(2+4) + 2(2+2) = 2(6) + 2(4) = 12 + 8 = 20$ inches.
Perimeter = $2\times 2 + 2\times 4 + 2\times 2 + 2\times 4 -2 \times 2 = 4 + 8 + 4 + 8 - 4 = 20$ inches

inference:
The horizontal part of the T is $2+2=4$ inches long.
The vertical part of the T is $4$ inches high.
The two rectangles have dimensions $2$ inches by $4$ inches.
The total perimeter is the sum of the lengths of all sides, excluding the shared sides.
The sides of the two rectangles are $2$ inches each, and $4$ inches each.
The shared side between the rectangles has length $2$ inches.
The perimeter of the T shape is $2(2) + 2(4) + 2(2) + 2(4) - 2(2) = 4 + 8 + 4 + 8 - 4 = 20$ inches.

$\boxed{20}$
